name: Platform Pals
description:
Submitted as part of the Multiplayer Game Jam 8/7/2022

Hey Bird-Brain! Think you and your chicken compatriate have what what it takes to strike it rich 💰?

Play as the platformer 🐔 and run, jump, and bounce your way to reach the treasure trove at the end of each island level. OR get a bird's-eye view by controlling the chicken bot 🤖 and bridge gaps with barrels, plant bouncy mushrooms, and slide platforms.

Either way you and your fowl-friend will need to work together and TRUST teamwork will prevail in this chicken coup designed for two.
